data.title: bd-2ji: Add maw ws attach command
data.description:
Adds 'maw ws attach <name>' to reconnect orphaned workspace directories (where 'jj workspace forget' was run but the directory remains) back to jj's workspace tracking.

Changes:
- Add Attach subcommand with name and optional -r/--revision args
- Check directory exists but workspace not tracked
- Preserve local files during reattachment (moves to temp, re-adds workspace, restores files)
- Show helpful messages on success and errors
- Fix test issue where workspace_validation tests failed when run from inside a workspace directory

Testing:
- All 8 workspace validation tests pass
- Manual testing confirmed attach works with orphaned directories
- Local files are preserved during reattachment
